name: Group 7 TSE Game Project - Dungeon Crawler Game
name_original: Group 7 TSE Game Project - Dungeon Crawler Game
description:
Dungeon Crawler game for our Team Software Engineering Module at UoL.

Please download and give us feedback. :))

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movement keys.

Escape - Pause Menu key.

Left Click - Shoot Key.

Developers: 

Antony Scott, Jonathan Byrne, Olli Kokkonen, Ellis Tomkinson, Liam Hilton, Harrison Ledgerton.
